universities.name: University of Nairobi
universities.description: The University of Nairobi is a collegiate research university based in Nairobi. It is the largest university in Kenya.

universities.name: Kenyatta University
universities.description: Kenyatta University is a public research university in Nairobi, Kenya. It is one of the leading universities in East Africa.

universities.name: Jomo Kenyatta University of Agriculture and Technology
universities.description: JKUAT is a public university that offers courses in Technology, Engineering, Science, Architecture, Law and Business Studies.

universities.name: Strathmore University
universities.description: Strathmore University is a leading non-profit private university in Kenya and one of the most progressive universities in East Africa.

universities.name: United States International University Africa
universities.description: USIU-Africa is a private university in Nairobi, Kenya that provides an American-style education.

universities.name: Daystar University
universities.description: Daystar University is a private Christian liberal arts university in Nairobi, Kenya.
